an5.174:1.1: Then the householder Anāthapiṇḍika went up to the Buddha, bowed, and sat down to one side. The Buddha said to him:
an5.174:2.1: “Householder, unless these five dangers and threats are given up, one is said to be unethical, and is reborn in hell.
an5.174:2.3: Killing living creatures, stealing, committing sexual misconduct, lying, and using alcoholic drinks that cause negligence.
an5.174:2.4: Unless these five dangers and threats are given up, one is said to be unethical, and is reborn in hell.
an5.174:3.1: Once these five dangers and threats are given up, one is said to be ethical, and is reborn in heaven.
an5.174:3.3: Killing living creatures, stealing, committing sexual misconduct, lying, and using alcoholic drinks that cause negligence.
an5.174:3.4: Once these five dangers and threats are given up, one is said to be ethical, and is reborn in heaven.
an5.174:4.1: Anyone who kills living creatures creates dangers and threats both in the present life and in lives to come, and experiences mental pain and sadness. Anyone who refrains from killing living creatures creates no dangers and threats either in the present life or in lives to come, and doesn’t experience mental pain and sadness.
an5.174:4.2: So that danger and threat is quelled for anyone who refrains from killing living creatures.
an5.174:8.1: Anyone who uses alcoholic drinks that cause negligence creates dangers and threats both in the present life and in lives to come, and experiences mental pain and sadness. Anyone who refrains from using alcoholic drinks that cause negligence creates no dangers and threats either in the present life or in lives to come, and doesn’t experience mental pain and sadness.
an5.174:8.2: So that danger and threat is quelled for anyone who refrains from using alcoholic drinks that cause negligence.
an5.174:10.1: Unless they give up these five threats,
an5.174:10.3: When their body breaks up, that witless person
an5.174:11.1: A person in the world doesn’t kill living creatures,
an5.174:12.3: When their body breaks up, that wise person
an5.174:12.4: is reborn in a good place.”
